QuestData.Title: A Little Kelp From My Foes
QuestData.Description:
I'm not sure what yer doin' here, but ye have my thanks. If ye want to get any further, though, ye'll need to get past that foul dog, Guarm.
I've tried meself a few times, and I think I have a plan. If we can get some of the seaweed these kvaldir wear, we might be able to trick the mutt. Guarm's mean, ye see, but not too smart.
What do ye say? Think ye can take on a few kvaldir?
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect $1oa pieces of seaweed from Kvaldir Mistcallers and Soulflayers in Helheim.
QuestData.CompletionText: Do ye have enough for a proper disguise?
QuestData.RewardText: Wait... ye killed how many kvaldir? Yer braver than I thought, outsider!$B$BI'm sure Helya will see that neither ye nor I belong here once we get past that dog of hers.
